    <a href="/nba/news/analysis">Analysis</a>
    <div class="primary-nav-ddl">
    <ul class="primary-nav-col" style="width: 15em; float: left; padding-top: 0.5em;">
    <li class="label"><u>Featured Writers</u></li><li><a href="/news/analysis/author/223/Jonny-Auping">Jonny Auping</a></li><li><a href="/news/analysis/author/217/Colin-McGowan">Colin McGowan</a></li><li><a href="/news/analysis/author/6/Christopher-Reina">Christopher Reina</a></li><li><a href="/news/analysis/author/211/Keith-P-Smith">Keith P Smith</a></li><li><a href="/news/analysis/author/228/Rafael-Uehara">Rafael Uehara</a></li><li><a href="/news/analysis/author/226/John-Wilmes">John Wilmes</a></li><li class="label">Â </li><li class="label"><u>More Contributors</u></li><li><a href="/news/analysis/author/249/Rafael-Canton">Rafael Canton</a></li><li><a href="/news/analysis/author/163/Yu-Miyagawa">Yu Miyagawa</a></li><li><a href="/news/analysis/author/248/Jack-Tien-Dana">Jack Tien-Dana</a></li><li><a href="/news/analysis/author/245/Micah-Wimmer">Micah Wimmer</a></li><li><a href="/news/analysis/author/247/Kevin-Yeung">Kevin Yeung</a></li></ul>
    <div class="portal" style="float: left; border-left: 1px solid black; padding-left: 1em; max-width: 50em;">
    <div class="secondary-story-container" style="border-top: 0;"><div class="secondary-story">
    <a class="article-image" href="/analysis/261477/Stephen-Curry-Is-Trapped-Between-The-Past-Present-And-Future" style="background-image: url('https://basketball.realgm.com/images/nba/4.2/wiretap/photos/2006/Curry_Stephen_gsw_191007.jpg');"></a>
    <div class="article-title"><a href="/analysis/261477/Stephen-Curry-Is-Trapped-Between-The-Past-Present-And-Future" style="padding-left: 0;">Stephen Curry Is Trapped Between The Past, Present And Future</a></div>
    <p class="author-details" style="margin: 0 0 0.5em;">
    by <a href="/news/analysis/author/245/Micah-Wimmer" style="text-decoration: none;">Micah Wimmer</a></p>
    <div class="article-content" style="font-weight: normal;">With Stephen Curry on his own again, he is unleashed in a way he hasn't been since the 2015-16 season, and though nothing can match the fever dream of that year, there's something thrilling about watching him try.</div>
    </div>
    <div class="secondary-story">
    <a class="article-image" href="/analysis/261472/Finding-The-Best-Use-For-Your-Joy-Of-The-Game" style="background-image: url('https://basketball.realgm.com/images/nba/4.2/wiretap/photos/2006/Garnett_Kevin_min_150520.jpg');"></a>
    <div class="article-title"><a href="/analysis/261472/Finding-The-Best-Use-For-Your-Joy-Of-The-Game" style="padding-left: 0;">Finding The Best Use For Your Joy Of The Game</a></div>
    <p class="author-details" style="margin: 0 0 0.5em;">
    by <a href="/news/analysis/author/217/Colin-McGowan" style="text-decoration: none;">Colin McGowan</a></p>
    <div class="article-content" style="font-weight: normal;">Kevin Garnett is less burdened by his own agenda, lives less firmly in his own fermenting bitterness. And he simply likes the sport more than Shaq does, so he's more apt to hand the younger generation its due.</div>
    </div>
    <div class="secondary-story">
    <a class="article-image" href="/analysis/261455/The-NBAs-Renewed-Team-Building-Imagination" style="background-image: url('https://basketball.realgm.com/images/nba/4.2/wiretap/photos/2006/Durant_Kevin_bkn_201215.jpg');"></a>
    <div class="article-title"><a href="/analysis/261455/The-NBAs-Renewed-Team-Building-Imagination" style="padding-left: 0;">The NBA's Renewed Team-Building Imagination</a></div>
    <p class="author-details" style="margin: 0 0 0.5em;">
    by <a href="/news/analysis/author/226/John-Wilmes" style="text-decoration: none;">John Wilmes</a></p>
    <div class="article-content" style="font-weight: normal;">Unlike the peak of the Warriors' era, the emerging championship contenders of today seem not to be bent in any consistent direction. It is time, instead, to build different kinds of flying that make the sport a more marvelous stew of style.</div>
    </div>
    <div class="secondary-story">
    <a class="article-image" href="/analysis/261398/The-Top-Picks-From-2020-Are-Making-Watchable-Trouble" style="background-image: url('https://basketball.realgm.com/images/nba/4.2/wiretap/photos/2006/Wiseman_James_gsw_210121.jpg');"></a>
    <div class="article-title"><a href="/analysis/261398/The-Top-Picks-From-2020-Are-Making-Watchable-Trouble" style="padding-left: 0;">The Top Picks From 2020 Are Making Watchable Trouble</a></div>
    <p class="author-details" style="margin: 0 0 0.5em;">
    by <a href="/news/analysis/author/217/Colin-McGowan" style="text-decoration: none;">Colin McGowan</a></p>
    <div class="article-content" style="font-weight: normal;">The most you can ask of a young player, if they're not immediately awesome as so few are, is for them to illumine new possibilities. Anthony Edwards, James Wiseman and LaMelo Ball are certainly doing that during their young careers.</div>
    </div>
    </div>
    </div>

columns = ['Season', 'Player Name', 'Conference', 'Date', 'Team','Pos','Hight','Weight','Age','PreDraftTeam','DraftYear','YOS']

```python
table = soup.find('table', attrs={'class': 'tablesaw','data-tablesaw-mode':'swipe'}).tbody
trs = table.find_all('tr')
for tr in trs:
  tds = tr.find_all('td')
  row = [td.text.replace('/n', '') for td in tds]
  df = df.append(pd.Series(row, index=columns), ignore_index=True)
```
